org.hypergraphdb.viewer
Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
  org.hypergraphdb.viewer.ActionManager

public class ActionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class containing actions used in menuBar, toolBar and pop-up menus

Author:
Konstantin Vandev
